wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
I signed up for Vonage this weekend, installed it in 5 minutes, and its working great. I expect I'll lower my cost with a bunch more features, and I'll use them. So far, so good - neither party sending nor receiving has been able to tell any difference from POTS yet.
I may try the softphone feature next... its an extra $9 a month, but its worth a look at least.
Chris
